Rare Monster Review (Vol. 1)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Raising/Training Tips: Rare Monster Review (Vol. 1)
By RNA on Friday, April 21, 2000 - 02:51 am:

jill-The most underated rare monster in game in my mind nobody seems to talk much about them probobly since their so hardto get but they rock my jill Jay-jay -is(purebreed first gen) at Life 612,Power-879,intelligence-999,skill-554,Speed 276,Defence-455.these guys kick ass they can handle their ground at both end of the court if they want a magic fight he'll summon his ice attacks if they want up close and personal he'll use his boxing attacks and beat his opponents to a pulp.At 455 defence(yes iknow i sould raise his def.)Zelandia and Drewguard(opponents from the major4) can hardly even get over 300 damage if they use physical attacks .Overall this monster is one of the greatest in my opinion and definetly worth the trouble of getting. Dragons -Man was I exited when i got my first dragon tusk ,but on the ranch this monster was the biggest dissapointment i have ever come across in this game its no its looks(they look cool by the way)its not its powerful attacks ,its the damn lifespan i treid to take the trouble of raising a 2nd generation dragon from my first one and it lived for 4 years and 1 month not giving me enough time to max out a stat and it only went on two errantreis and fought on 4 tourneys these monsters would be great exept for its huge lifespan handicap oh well cause I dont have a mr1 cd I used dragons instead it only lasted 2 months of my harsh training and one free for all tournament .

nxt issue pheinex and zilla

-- stupid (twopacliveson@hotmail.com), January 26, 2000
